body.p: To his excellency the Governor of Kentucky

As the wife and daughter of Jacob Scarbro who is now confined in the state Prison, May we humbly & imploringly ask at the hand of yoru Excellency a release of the unfortunate prisoner -- ^Jacob Scarbro^ We deny not that he did in the heat of passion (though unintentionally) Kill his fellow man, but struck the unlucky blow as he thought in defence of his son, -- He is the ^only^ hope & stay of a helpless family in this time of trouble
Release O; do release; the husband & the father of your humble petioners

Mary Ann ^her X mark^ Scarbro
Catharine ^her X mark^ Scarbro

Jefferson Co
Jacob Scarborough
Petition for Pardon & Pardon Issued -- July 3rd
